plot outline: Right from her childhood, Akhila(Shvashakti Sachdev) is very close to her dad(Srikanth Iyengar). The father and daughter cannot live without each other but a major mistake done by Akhila creates a rift between the two. This is also the time, Akhila comes to Hyderabad to undergo her IAS coaching. There, a young guy named Amar(Vijay Ram) starts wooing her. At first, Akhila says no to Amar but gets attracted to him later. The rest of the story is as to how Akhila wins her father's love all over again and also gets her love story successful.
title: Amaram Akhilam Prema
plot: A mistake by Akhila tears her apart from her father, who loves her the most. On a journey to win her father back, she meets Amar, a carefree guy who realizes what true love is.

Right from her childhood, Akhila(Shvashakti Sachdev) is very close to her dad(Srikanth Iyengar). The father and daughter cannot live without each other but a major mistake done by Akhila creates a rift between the two. This is also the time, Akhila comes to Hyderabad to undergo her IAS coaching. There, a young guy named Amar(Vijay Ram) starts wooing her. At first, Akhila says no to Amar but gets attracted to him later. The rest of the story is as to how Akhila wins her father's love all over again and also gets her love story successful.
